channel.title: My bro keeps saying we need a new source in order for pk items to drop
channel.description: i think there is something we have to do in order to make stuff drop does anyone no how to make it so all ur stuff drops when you die in the wilderness or turn it to pvp drops instead even though its a 317 server? :eek:

item.title: My bro keeps saying we need a new source in order for pk items to drop
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

well be specific, whats your base?

Read full topic
item.source: My bro keeps saying we need a new source in order for pk items to drop

item.title: My bro keeps saying we need a new source in order for pk items to drop
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

robertshannahan:

no its a 317 im talking about the stuff he is carrying dropping do i need a new source and client?

No dude here are possible situations that may be happening

  1. If he is admin and you are admin and you kill each other it might just be because admins cannot lose their items.
  2. The drops are just false and you need to go to java files and fix it, wouldn’t ask me i suck at coding haha.

Read full topic
